ARABIC: إِنَّكَ لَا تَهْدِى مَنْ أَحْبَبْتَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهْدِى مَن يَشَآءُ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You cannot guide those you would like to but Allah guides those He wills. He has best knowledge of the guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You cannot guide any one you like: God guides whosoever He please. He knows best who will come to guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (O Prophet), you cannot grant guidance to whom you please. It is Allah Who guides those whom He will. He knows best who are amenable to guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), you cannot guide whomever you love, but God guides whomever He wants and knows best those who seek guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed it is not such that you can guide whomever you love, but Allah guides whomever He wills; and He well knows the people upon guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, you guide not whom you like, but Allah guides whom He wills. And He knows best those who are the guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely you cannot guide whom you love, but Allah guides whom He pleases, and He knows best the followers of the right way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Thou guidest not whom thou likest, but God guides whom He wills, and knows very well those that are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! thou (O Muhammad) guidest not whom thou lovest, but Allah guideth whom He will. And He is Best Aware of those who walk aright.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: You cannot guide whoever you please: it is God who guides whom He will. He best knows those who would accept guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily thou shalt not guide whomsoever thou lovest, but Allah shall guide whomsoever He will. And He knoweth best who are the guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: You cannot guide whomever you wish, but [it is] Allah [who] guides whomever He wishes, and He knows best those who are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: It is true thou wilt not be able to guide every one, whom thou lovest; but Allah guides those whom He will and He knows best those who receive guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! You (O Muhammad SAW) guide not whom you like, but Allah guides whom He wills. And He knows best those who are the guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You cannot guide whom you please; it is Allah who guides whom He will. He knows well those who are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You cannot guide whom you love, but God guides whom He wills, and He knows best those who are guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, [O Muhammad], you do not guide whom you like, but Allah guides whom He wills. And He is most knowing of the [rightly] guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [28:56] The following was revealed regarding the Prophet’s longing for his uncle Abū Tālib to embrace faith: You cannot guide whom you like, to be guided, but [it is] God [Who] guides whomever He will, and He knows best those who will be guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! thou) Muhammad (guidest not) know not (whom thou lovest) i.e. whom you love to accept faith: i.e. Abu Talib, (but Allah guideth) He gives success and leads (whom He will) to His religion: Abu Bakr, 'Umar and their fellow believers. (And He is best aware of those who walk aright) to His religion.
